DataElement.preferredName: Exceptional Response Prior Surgical Procedure Intent Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to describe the intent or purpose of a surgical procedure that was completed before the treatment that resulted in an exceptional response for a patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Exceptional Response Prior Surgical Procedure Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An achievement of either a complete disease response, or a partial disease response of at least 6 months duration in a trial or treatment where the overall response rate is less than 10 percent._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._Earlier in time or order._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An achievement of either a complete disease response, or a partial disease response of at least 6 months duration in a trial or treatment where the overall response rate is less than 10 percent.:Earlier in time or order.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Concepts.definition: An achievement of either a complete disease response, or a partial disease response of at least 6 months duration in a trial or treatment where the overall response rate is less than 10 percent.

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: A statement or an account describing something.

Concepts.definition: A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 1/25/23 added alt name for ticket number CADSR0001948 for CCTG cjl.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act of cutting out; the surgical removal of part or all of a structure or organ.: Surgery which cures disease.

Concepts.definition: The surgical removal of a lesion, often as part of a biopsy and with healthy margins.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

Concepts.definition: A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

DataElement.changeDescription: Released during draft new, retired and orphan content clean-up_11.27.18_ghd; 12/12/14 jc added Exceptional Responder CSI.  --- Curated to support the Exceptional Responder trial.
